name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Machine Learning Specialist with over 10 years of experience in developing innovative solutions in **machine learning**, **data science**, and **cloud-based workflows**. Proficient in both **supervised** and **unsupervised learning**, **deep learning**, and **reinforcement learning**, with a strong focus on **probabilistic modeling** and **model optimization**. Experienced in leveraging **Python** and various **ML frameworks** for building and evaluating models. Demonstrated success in NLP applications and utilizing advanced techniques such as **transformers**. Skilled in dataset design and maintaining fairness through regularization strategies, alongside excellent communication skills. Proven capability to drive impactful projects at major organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, specializing in AI/ML pipelines and cloud-native architectures.
